io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.events

Interface NucleusClearInventoryEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Event, TargetUserEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    NucleusClearInventoryEvent.Post, NucleusClearInventoryEvent.Pre

    public interface NucleusClearInventoryEvent
extends TargetUserEvent
    Fired when a player's inventory is cleared. Should be used to clear other, secondary, inventories

    Note that the target user may be a Player

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  NucleusClearInventoryEvent.Post
      Called when standard inventories have been cleared and should be used to clear other inventories.
      static interface  NucleusClearInventoryEvent.Pre
      Called before any clearing takes effect.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isClearingAll()
      Gets whether the entire inventory is being cleared, or the MainPlayerInventory only.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.user.TargetUserEvent

        getTargetUser

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.Event

        getCause, getContext, getSource

    • Method Detail

      • isClearingAll

        boolean isClearingAll()
        Gets whether the entire inventory is being cleared, or the MainPlayerInventory only.
